description: Stopped in after a day of shopping at Union Square. This was the best part of our day. The bartender Greg, made us the best Cosmos in the city. My girl was very impressed and VERY happy. We will make this a part of our shopping routine. Highly recommend everybody stop by and top off your shopping experience. We Will be back soon.
author: Servando M.

description: We walked past and thought this place looked cool. It's our first time here in the city and we went for it. They had a very interesting and different food and drink menu so we had a lot of questions. KJ answered everything and made amazing suggestions. I have a severe nut allergy and she thought I had a nut on my plate and she was double/triple checking to make sure it wasn't. She so gave us great suggestions for activities and areas to check out. So happy we came to urban tavern
author: Aj B.

description: Josue was the best!!! He was super friendly and gave great recommendations.  Love this place.  We came on a Wednesday and they had a "Wine Wednesday" special - 50% off select bottles!  We got a Rombauer Chardonnay for retail price... highly abnormal in any restaurant serving wine. Food was delicious. We had the best time.  Definitely coming back.
author: Gautam J.

description: Meh. Mediocre at best. Ordered the cucumbers as a starter hoping for some spice. Nothing. Very bland halibut and the waitress knew nothing about the menu.
author: Melanie W.

description: I visited Urban Tavern for the first time with four very close friends.  We had a great meal and Sebastian, our waiter, made the experience even more pleasurable.  His recommendations for dinner were spot on and his, jovial, personal caring, and humor kept us in stitches.
author: Diana L.

description: The menu had very few entries. We asked for a well done skirt steak, they brought us extra dry steak with burnt baby potatoes. The burger had no taste whatsoever. They never bothered to refill water. The price for two dishes was $61 (extremely expensive for what we got). Definitely not going back!
author: Georgy Z.

description: the food was wonderful.  convenient parking (for the city).   we caught a meal before a show and they were gracious and professional.
author: Dee C.

description: Wow. I had an amazing dinner here last weekend. Something as simple as bread and butter was elevated to another level with the addition of some amazing herbs.  The dishes (octopus, salmon poke, little gems salad, & half chicken) were so unique and executed very well. Our server was super friendly and said they have a new head chef who used to be at French Laundry.  The only negative is that I was too full to try dessert.  Maybe I'll just have to come back next weekend!
author: Veronica E.

description: While in town for a meeting, I stayed at the Hilton. I had a quick opportunity to do some shopping before the stores all closed. Having worked up an appetite, I popped into Urban Tavern for a quiet solo dinner. My server, Sebastian, was wonderful, warm and welcoming. I asked for some recommendations. He selected his 3 favorite small bites to create my perfect tasting menu. Warm octopus perfectly flavored over a bed of grilled vegetables, delicious chicken meatballs with just the right amount of spice, and mouth watering sautéed trumpet mushrooms. Fabulous combination!  For dessert the berry bomb was as beautiful to the eye as it was to the palate. Thank you for making my dinner alone so fun!
author: Jane L.

description: Visited San Francisco over NYE with some friends. This restaurant was connected to the Hilton and we had seen it so many times we decided to give it a try. We were in search of a really good piece of steak to pair with some red wine and really we got quite the opposite. I asked for my steak to be medium well, I got burnt steak. BURNT TO A CRISP. not to mention our waiter came by to take our order and never came by again. We had to flag him down to get the checks. I'm giving it a 2 because it was convenient to not have to layer up to get to the restaurant but the service, the food & the prices were atrocious.
author: E C.

description: Excellent food, excellent service. Sebastian is the best.  High recommend braised octopus, meatballs, Brussels sprouts salad, milk bread.
author: Michelle K.

description: This place can be described as "solid", and I mean that in a very positive way.  2 of 4 dishes were surprisingly good, and the other 2 were OK.  Cocktail was reasonable.  Ambiance and service was solid.  Not gonna blow your socks off, but honestly for some reason we had low expectations at Urban Tavern pleasantly surprised us.
author: Amjad S.

description: l used to frequent this restaurant a couple of years ago and it was a favorite, after reopening l am happy to say that its better than ever. they rehired my favorite waiter Jose, and changed the menu alittle but the quality of service and food leaves me completely satisfied.
author: Tony N.

description: Excellent food! Service is supreme- ask for Sebastian! "This is my jam" - cocktail of choiceHartford Pinot, smooth.
author: Lisa K.
